Params: {2: "Let's go with this piece. It's perfect for piano four hands.", 3: '4'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selena', 3: "I agree. We're really on the same wavelength here.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Browsing through the sheet music, you press the keys. The melodious piano notes flow through the air, drawing passersby to stop and listen.'}
{3: 'Selena places both hands on the piano keys, closes her eyes, and feels the pulse of the melody.'}
{3: 'At just the right moment, her fingers touch the keys, drawing the attention of more passersby.'}
{3: 'Your melodies interweave gracefully, gradually blending into a beautiful harmony...'}
